class my_charts.web_app.modules.gmail_manager.GUser¶

Class provides Gmail user’s interface.

delete_messages(sender)¶

Delete all messages from a certain sender.

Parameters

sender – str

get_categories_info()¶

Create (dict) messages_by_category_dict = {“Unread”: list, “Inbox”: list,”Primary”: list, “Social”: list, “Promotions”: list, “Updates”: list, “Forums”: list} Create (dict) categories_info_dict = {“Unread”: int, “Inbox”: int, “Primary”: int, “Social”: int, “Promotions”: int, “Updates”: int, “Forums”: int} :return None

get_chart_inbox_info()¶

Transforms self.inbox_info to dictionary in special format for chart in web page. :return: dict

get_defined_categories_info()¶

Create (dict) defined_categories_info_dict = {“Primary”: num, ‘Social’:num, “Updates”: num, “Promotions”: num} :return: None

get_end_date()¶

Return a date that is a month before the today’s date (eg. “2020-04-07”) :return: str

static get_http_url(urls)¶

Return http unsubscribe url if it exists, else return None

Parameters

urls – list(str, str)

Returns

str

get_inbox_info(ladelid='INBOX')¶

Return a dictionary that has sender as a key and number of messages as a value. :return: inbox_info = {from (str): tuple(value (int), sender_name, sender_msg_id), …}

get_lst_sender_sub()¶

Transforms self.sub_info to list with only names of the senders, from whom GUser can unsubscribe. :return: list

static get_message_date(message)¶

Returns the message date with special formatting. :param message: dict :return: string

get_raw_message(msg_id)¶

Get the full email message data with body content in the raw field as a base64url. Decode this message and Return a raw message

Parameters

msg_id – str

Returns

str

get_subscription_info()¶
Update a dictionary. sub_info = {<sender_name>: {

‘sub_url’: str, ‘msg_ids’: list(str, …) }, …}

get_unread_info()¶

Return a number of unread messages and read messages that are up to end date. Create (dict) unread_info_dict = {“Read”: num_all - num_unread, “Unread”: num} :return None

static get_unsubscribe_url(msg_str)¶

Return a list of <mailto: link> and <https: link>

Parameters

msg_str – str

Returns

str

get_user_messages_lst(ladelids='INBOX', sender_email=None)¶

Returns user messages list on the last 30 days, which contains only an id and a threadId. Additional message details can be fetched using the messages.get method. :return: list of dict [{‘id’: ‘1714f35d4d28e916’,

‘threadId’: ‘1714f35d4d28e916’}, …]

is_valid_date(message)¶

Return True if a message date is bigger than the end date, False otherwise :return: bool

retrieve_sender_info(message_id)¶

Retrieves such information as name of the sender and its email address. :message_id: str

Returns

tuple of str = (“name”, “email”)

set_service()¶

Return a service got by user’s credentials :return: None

unsubscribe(sender)¶

Unsubscribe from a certain sender by his/her unsubscribe url.

Parameters

sender – str

static write_json(inbox_info_dict)¶

This function loads the data from the dictionary to json file. Namely, it loads the data got from GUser.get_inbox_info method. :param inbox_info_dict: dict :return: None

This module implements auth ADT.
